channel.title: K.O I need help With Knight Online
channel.description: Please Help people i cant load K.0 If i what to start ko it says Error: Login connection failed please retry connecting.... Please help!!

item.title: K.O I need help With Knight Online
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

It depends are you using USKO, or MYKO? I prefer MYKO cuz USKO sucks its full of lag, full of turks, can hardly ever get on the servers customer service sucks, the GMs suck… if you use www.knightonlineworld.com I suggest you uninstall that and try www.knight-online.com.my use odin1 or 2 servers and I might even help you lvl up :).

Btw if you are using USKO(www.knightonlineworld.com) X-Trap might be the reason you can’t load it up after they added that a ton of their paying customer and non paying alike could no longer access the game and what does customer service do about it? SHIT. So switch to the link I told you, its a much better version.

Read full topic
item.source: K.O I need help With Knight Online

item.title: K.O I need help With Knight Online
item.dc:creator: @Pirate_Source Pirate_Source
item.description:
@Pirate_Source wrote:

i know whats the wrong is you ip in knight is worng

go to KnightOnline/Server

its a txt file

and put the ip to knightonlineworld.com

like this

[Server]
Count=1
IP0=login.knightonlineworld.com

[Version]
Files=1453

[Join]
Registration site=http://www.knightonlineworld.com/joinus.asp

Read full topic
